product_name: SmartWool Boyfriend Pocket T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: You could just keep taking his tees, but why not grab your own SmartWool Boyfriend Pocket T-Shirt? The soft merino is perfect for slacklining at base camp or chilling at the amphitheater. 100% merino wool breathes well and is naturally warm when it's cool out and cool when it's warm; merino also stretches and manages odor naturally. Jersey knit offers UPF 20 sun protection. SmartWool Boyfriend Pocket T-shirt features a single chest pocket, scoop neck and rounded hem for a relaxed fit. Machine wash in cold water; dry flat. Closeout.
